title: Sri Lanka stocks marginally up in mid-day trade on Monday
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s main stock index was marginally up in mid-day trade, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index moved very slow within the first hour gaining only 0.06 percent or 4.78 points to 7,903.57 by 1145 hrs.
The more liquid index S&P SL20 however remained in red slipping 0.33 percent or 8.56 points to 2,552.01.
Top gainers were  Sampath Bank, Melstacorp and Richard Pieris.
